revised_title: Optical Rotatory Dispersion of Tartaric Acid and Tartrates
tldr: The authors investigate the optical rotatory dispersion of tartaric acid and tartrates, building upon the work of Biot. They discuss the influence of water, the action of alkalis and acids, and the exaltation of rotatory power in boro-tartaric solutions. The study covers a wide range of topics and contributes to the understanding of the complex nature of rotatory dispersion.
